# didFailToDecodeNotification

**Type Property**

A notification that indicates the video renderer fails to decode a sample buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
class let didFailToDecodeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Handling decode failures

- **didFailToDecodeNotificationErrorKey**: A key to retrieve an error object that provides the details of the failure.

items.description: A key to retrieve an error object that provides the details of the failure.
